General.Name: Kisses From Italy Inc
General.Description: Kisses from Italy Inc. operates and franchises a chain of restaurants in North America and Europe. The company's restaurants offer grilled paninis, deli paninis, coffee and tea beverages, desserts, and other products. It also provides its branded products in retail food and grocery stores located in Ontario and Quebec, Canada. Kisses from Italy Inc. was incorporated in 2013 and is headquartered in Miami, Florida.
General.Address: 80 SW 8th Street, Miami, FL, United States, 33130

1.Name: Mr. Claudio  Ferri
1.Title: Co-Founder, Co-CEO, CFO, Chief Investment Officer & Director
